client_side.gui.model

Class PictionaryClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • client_side.gui.model.PictionaryClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class PictionaryClient
extends Object
implements Runnable
    Client responsible for establishing connection with server and forwarding messages/orders to app Client will start establishing connection only if server is running, otherwise throw an error. When connection is stable client is responsible for client-server communication and sending parsed orders from server to view controller or pictionary app.

      • parseProtocolMessage

        public void parseProtocolMessage(String plainMessage)
                          throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException,
                                 PictionaryException
        Parses the message which client received from server. Parsed message is converted to specials orders and passed to view controller.
        Parameters:
        plainMessage - the plain message that client has received
        Throws:
        com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - throws when parsing goes wrong
        PictionaryException - throws when parsing goes wrong

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(String messageType,
                        String message,
                        String receiver)
                 throws PictionaryException,
                        IOException
        Allows sending messages to server/choosen client/ broadcast - to each connected client to server
        Parameters:
        messageType - message type from pictionaryProtocolParser
        message - plain massage
        receiver - the receiver (receiver username)
        Throws:
        PictionaryException - throws when parsing goes wrong
        IOException - throws when connection is lost

        Disconnect client and clean stuff.
